transcript: I'm here. I have kids. I have to take them places on the weekends. I don't have time to come back here. Please I really need you to help me

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Um, I have kids.  I have to take them places on the weekends.  I don't have time to come back here.  Please.  I really need you to help me.
